long.el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,hr,sk,sl,:
Learn any language, just by listening to Music on YouTube! ( Beta version)

As it is a Beta version, this may have some minor issues. We will be glad if you let us know  so that we can solve the issue for you.

Say goodbye to boring language learning methods and hello to an exciting new way to learn with our chrome extension. 
Our extension allows you to learn a new language while enjoying your favorite songs on YouTube. With the extension, you can see the lyrics of the song in the sidebar of the player synchronized with the song. 

And if you hover over any word, you can instantly see the meaning right on the song. No need to stop the music to look up vocabulary on dictionaries.

Spotify will be added soon, so you can take your language learning on the go. 

Try it today and experience the joy of learning a new language with music.
